title: NIT Raipur Notification for 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Research Assistant Posts
description: National Institute of Technology Raipur (NIT Raipur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Raipur Notification for 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below...
